title: The unexpected benefit of going sober (not what you might think)
text:
Flic Everett didn’t drink in any great quantity, and only planned to quit alcohol for a few months. But two years on, she’s still teetotal. Here, she reveals how she beat the cravings - and the unexpected impact that going sober had on her social life and what she was like as a friend

At the start of 2018, I woke up one morning with my face flaming and a poisonous headache drilling into my temples. Looking in the bathroom mirror, I was horrified to see that my cheeks were crimson. ‘That’s it,’ I called to my partner, Andy. ‘I’m done with drinking for now.’
